title: 17. You developed a python application that exposes an HTTP(s) endpoint for retrieving 2-week weather forecast for a given location. You deployed the application in a single Google Cloud Compute Engine Virtual Machine, but the application is not as popular as you anticipated and has been receiving very few requests. To minimize costs, your colleague suggested containerizing the application and deploying on a suitable GCP compute service. Where should you deploy your containers?
alternatives: B. GKE with horizontal pod autoscaling and cluster autoscaler enabled.
